name: Sparkle (itch) (SudeBabur, Lapla1)
description:
A racoon chases after a sparkly thing. After the thing got lost, he meets with a monkey and a cat that who will "guide the way" to the sparkly thing.

Made in 48 hours for OYGEM Game Hackathon 2

The Theme is Guiding The Way 

How to play?:

-You can shoot the enemys and platforms with your "Tüftüf"

-You can enable and disable your "Tüftüf" by pressing the M button.

-After you active it, you can shoot with Left Click.

-Pay attention to Monkey and Cat, they will warn or show what to do.

-And for technical reasons, we don't suggest to playing it in fullscreen.

Our Team:

Özgün Özer - Level Designer, Coder

Sude Babur - 2D Artist, Game Designer
